welcome_message_body: "Welcome to North Tonawanda, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque views of the Niagara River. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buffalo Niagara International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Buffalo Niagara International Airport serves low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by selecting the network name and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Catharines Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Catharines Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight operations, ensuring efficient transportation of goods.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.
